name: Colliers International Group Inc.
description: Colliers International Group Inc. is a leading global commercial real estate services company, headquartered in Toronto, Canada. Founded in 1976, Colliers has grown to become a prominent player in the real estate services industry, operating in over 68 countries with a workforce of more than 18,000 professionals. The company specializes in providing a comprehensive range of services, including property management, investment management, project management, and advisory services for both clients and investors. Colliers focuses on delivering innovative solutions to enhance the real estate experience, leveraging advanced technology and data analytics to drive client success. The firm is committed to sustainability and responsible business practices, aiming to create value for clients while positively impacting communities. With a client-centric approach, Colliers assists businesses in navigating the complexities of the real estate market, whether through leasing, sales, or capital markets transactions. The company’s mission is to accelerate the success of its clients by providing expert advice and tailored solutions that meet their unique needs.

seo.meta_title: Colliers International Group Inc. | Global Real Estate Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Colliers International Group Inc., a leader in commercial real estate services. Discover our innovative solutions and commitment to client success.

faq.question: What services does Colliers provide?
faq.answer: Colliers provides a range of services including property management, investment management, project management, and advisory services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Colliers?
faq.answer: Jay Hennick is the CEO of Colliers International Group Inc.

faq.question: Where is Colliers headquartered?
faq.answer: Colliers is headquartered in Toronto, Ontario, Canada.
